text: Prudential Financial, Inc. is an American Fortune Global 500 and Fortune 500 company. Its subsidiaries provide insurance, retirement planning, investment management, and other products and services to both retail and institutional customers throughout the United States and in over 40 other countries. It was founded in 1875. == Philanthropic Initiatives == The company is also engaged in philanthropic activities. For example, it hosted the Prudential Emerging Visionaries program from 2022 to 2024, awarding high school students with community service projects. Recipients included Okezue Bell, Aanand Mehta, and Mark Leschinsky. ==References== Category:1875 establishments in the United States
title: Prudential Financial
